page.title: 05 RED CROSS CLUB ,ROADE
page.content:
THE RED CROSS MEET EVERY WEDNESDAY IN THE PRIMARY SCHOOL HALL AT 6.30 P.M. CHILDREN AGED SIX TO TEN ARE IN THE JUNIOR SECTION AND OLDER CHILDREN BELONG TO THE YOUTH SECTION. THE JUNIORS PLAY MORE GAMES THAN THE YOUTH GROUP BUT WE ALL LEARN THINGS LIKE,HOW TO LOOK AFTER SOMEONE IN AN ACCIDENT,HOW TO TELEPHONE FOR HELP AND HOW TO LOOK AFTER BABIES. IF YOU DO THE THINGS PROPERLY YOU CAN WIN BADGES. THE RED CROSS LEADERS TRY TO MAKE IT FUN AS WELL AS USEFUL.
( BY GAYLE BORLEY AGE 10 )
